column1: #Text=Do they actually run camps associated with that ?
#Text=DM loves guns but there 's no camps for shooting .
#Text=What is the next step we should take in raising the general public 's awareness of the atrocities of the " Church " of Scientology .
#Text=Also , besides www.xenutv.com , what are some other , reputable , citable sources of information on these abuses ?
#Text=There are plenty of great sites starting with the granddaddy of them all — www.xenu.net .
#Text=Professor David Touretzky 's various sites are well researched and important resources .
#Text=My favorite book on Scientology is Bare-Faced Messiah .
#Text=It and many others can now be read on the web .
#Text=I 'd like to do audiobook versions of them for people to download .
#Text=Where , oh where , is the time , however .
#Text=Why does Scientology accuse people of crimes when they are asked questions ?
